scripts.pretest: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd webclient && yarn build"  "cd server && yarn build:database"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd webclient && yarn build"  "cd server && yarn start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd webclient && yarn start" "cd server && yarn start:dev"
